ygData.subject: 8th level pet
ygData.msgSnippet: I m sorry if this message sounds bad, but i love the game, just a little upset right now.  I finally made 8th level, and so off I go to get my pet spell.  I
ygData.messageBody: I'm sorry if this message sounds bad, but i love the game, just a little upset right now. I finally made 8th level, and so off I go to get my pet spell. I had read many reports on this list, so I thought myself prepared. After about an hour and a half trip from Felwithe, I finally reach High Hold Pass. My invisibility still going strong, I procede in a short distance only to be rooted and killed by some #@!!@#$ orc who could see invisible. I came from Kithicor forest. Was I just unlucky? Is there another better way in, other than through kithicor? That place is insane. How do they expect us to ever get a pet at this level? I've been hearing Mages whine about have to research 24th level pets. How about getting screwed out of 8th level. If my bitching is unfounded, please tell me. I will appologize. If there is an easier way, or I just got unlucky, let me know. Please.
